verbose_text: In addition, nuclear factor kappaB (NF-kappaB), c-Jun N-terminal kinase (JNK), extracellular signal regulated kinases and p38 mitogen activated protein kinase inhibitors and TNF-alpha were used to determine the molecular mechanism of autophagy during the inflammatory conditions, and only the NF-kappaB and JNK inhibitor were found to enhance the autophagy of rat NP cells.
evidence: NF-kappaB and JNK inhibitor were found to enhance the autophagy
